articles.author: Maria Pulcinella, Meir Rinde, Nick Kariuki
articles.title: Philadelphia’s slavery exhibit is restored at President’s House Site - WHYY
articles.description: “This is the American people fighting back and saying we will not accept this,” said one Independence Hall visitor. “Will not allow history to be rewritten.”
articles.content:
Bill Rooney, a Chestnut Hill resident, was passing by when he saw the restoration underway.
“It feels like history being made again,” he said. “To have that history taken down is a step back. It was… [+1198 chars]
